name: 25 Paper Straws In A Variety of Colours
description:
These are a perfect addition to any occasion, whether its a wedding, party or other special event.

These straws a thick, durable and most importantly bio-degradable 

You get a pack of 25 straws.

We have the following colours available.



Please note that the straw colours might be slightly different then they appear in the images due to a number of factors such as lighting and manufacturing.

name: Rustic Burlap Hessian Table Runners
description:
These handmade Burlap Hessian table runners are 2 metres in length and approx 30cm in width.  

The burlap material adds to the vintage feel, and gives an extra special touch to your overall theme. Each is hand stitched to give the frayed edges look as seen in the images supplied.

What you see is what you get here! Each one is crafted personally, and has the quality to go with it.

You have the option to purchase just the one, or we have the option to purchase 10.  Shipping is the same rate for 10 as it is for the single runner.
